title: game freezes/laggouts
body: So far today I have tried to play ranked but both times I have the game freezes or lags out causing me to miss locking in. I have now a 30 min ban cause of it. I would post help on support but the page request you verify your email and it doesn't send it. Please fix it. {{champion:245}} :D

replies.body: Crashing in champion select could happen for a few reasons, like a network issue or third party programs.  As a first step, if you are using any apps like play.tv or overwolf go ahead and remove them.  Let me know if you still have issues afterwards!
